motivator: "I picture heaven to be a continuation of the ideal home" (David O Mckay).
desire: Have a happy and successful marriage and family life.
belief: Going to the temple often with my wife will greatly benefit our marriage.
knowledge: The Lord's prophet has promised:"I picture heaven to be a continuation of the ideal home"(President Russell M. Nelson).
goal: Attend the temple twice a month with Elizabeth.
plan: Schedule a temple appointment for us about every 2 weeks and arrange a babysitter.
action: Have scheduled 2 temple appointments for Elizabeth and I.
victory: Attended temple 2 times a month every month the temple was open this year since April.

motivator: "To love my neighbor as myself, I must love myself"(JT Suchanski).
belief: Reading and studying the scriptures daily will help me to be happy.
knowledge: The Lord's prophet has promised:"When we follow the counsel of our leaders to read and study the scriptures, benefits and blessings of many kinds come to us. This is the most profitable of all study in which we could engage."(President Howard W. Hunter).
goal: Read and study the scriptures daily.
plan: Get up early enough to have time to study the scriptures in the morning. Start each day with scripture study.
action: I have a designated scripture study routine that I follow each day.
victory: I have done my scripture study routine every day this year.
